Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.teleportation

Class BlockSafety

java.lang.Object
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.teleportation.BlockSafety
@Service public final class BlockSafety extends Object
Used to check get or find block/location-related information.

    • canSpawnAtLocationSafely

      public boolean canSpawnAtLocationSafely(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.Location location)
      This function checks whether the block at the coordinates given is safe or not by checking for Lava/Fire/Air etc. This also ensures there is enough space for a player to spawn!
      Parameters:
      location - The Location
      Returns:
      Whether the player can spawn safely at the given Location

    • canSpawnAtBlockSafely

      public boolean canSpawnAtBlockSafely(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.block.Block block)
      This function checks whether the block at the coordinates given is safe or not by checking for Lava/Fire/Air etc. This also ensures there is enough space for a player to spawn!
      Parameters:
      block - The Block
      Returns:
      Whether the player can spawn safely at the given Location

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The safe location if found, otherwise null.

    • findSafeSpawnLocation

      @Nullable public @Nullable org.bukkit.Location findSafeSpawnLocation(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.Location location, int horizontalRange, int verticalRange)
      Finds the closest possible safe location around the given location.
      Parameters:
      location - The target location to find
      horizontalRange - The radius around x,z of given location to search.
      verticalRange - The height of how far up and down to search.
      Returns:
      The safe location if found, otherwise null.
